pages.text: Any respectable druid can carve enchanted runes, allowing natural (or otherworldly) energies to flow through the ancient symbols. However, a sword is far to long an inelegant for carving. Instead, druids use $(l:apparatus/knife)Knives$() for their various runes, carving into stone and wood alike.
Druids call this "Runic Carving" and can engrave this runes while holding the required herb in their offhand, which is consumed in the process.$(br2)
